title: Skins
body:
It's my opinion that champions such as {{champion:268}}  and {{champion:154}}  need new skins having only one alternative option. I can understand that this concept may be overshadowed at the moment due to the potential balancing of {{champion:245}} , but these champions need maintenance too, and I would love to see something like Raven or Eagle themed {{champion:268}} , and a swamp themed {{champion:154}}  for example.
(Edit) And {{champion:432}}  too

replies.body: Zac just received Pool Party and three chroma options! :D (They just hit PBE yesterday.)

*tackles*

Katey! You should give Riven Kat's Kitty Kat skin for Halloween. She'd look adorable.

Azir could use a new skin but i would prefer he got his in november/december as a nutcracker/ toy soldier skin would fit him very well.
Zac's is on the PBE as KateyKhaos said.
Bard can wait as he was released 2 months before ekko so he has a while before he needs a skin.
